divs: Sighting DetailsI was out side riding the Yamaha 70 when I observed the silent traveling craft, proceeded to climb the roof to get a better view. The craft was gone as fast as I could climb the chimney. At least a footmball field long, Three circular lights at the rear of the craft, totaly silent. Second sighting was about 6 years later traveling Northbound over the ocean going towards Point Magu and I witnessed this from Hermosa beach. Interstingto say the least.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Torrance
There were no other sightings in Torrance on or around July 1st 1998
Summary: Object traveling Eastbound following Pacific Coast Highway
